variable.name: SUBJID
variable.description: Deidentified Subject's ID/Unique Patient Name (UPN)

variable.name: case_control
variable.description: Case or control?

variable.name: FAB
variable.description: French-American-British (FAB) classification category for bone marrow biopsy and aspirate

variable.name: Sex
variable.description: Gender of participant

variable.name: %BM Blast @ diagnosis
variable.description: What percentage of myeloblasts were present in the bone marrow at the time of diagnosis?

variable.name: PB WBC @ diagnosis
variable.description: What was the peripheral blood White Blood Cell Count at diagnosis?

variable.name: Age at entry
variable.description: Age at diagnosis

variable.name: Race
variable.description: Subject's Race

variable.name: %PB Blast
variable.description: What percentage of blasts were present in the peripheral blood at diagnosis?

variable.name: Treatment Protocol
variable.description: Treatment protocol given to patient

variable.name: Transplant Type
variable.description: Type(s) of transplant patient received, if any

variable.name: Patient expired
variable.description: Has patient expired?

variable.name: Cytogenetics Clone 1
variable.description: Cytogenetic abnormality found in clone 1 (if applicable)

variable.name: Abnormal/Total Cells (clone 1)
variable.description: # of abnormal cells in clone 1/total cells evaluated (if applicable)

variable.name: Cytogenetics Clone 2
variable.description: Cytogenetic abnormality found in clone 2 (if applicable)

variable.name: Abnormal/Total Cells (Clone 2)
variable.description: # of abnormal cells in clone 2/total cells evaluated (if applicable)

variable.name: Cytogenetics Clone3
variable.description: Cytogenetic abnormality found in clone 3 (if applicable)

variable.name: Abnormal/Total Cells (clone 3)
variable.description: # of abnormal cells in clone 3/total cells evaluated (if applicable)

variable.name: Cytogenetics Clone 4
variable.description: Cytogenetic abnormality found in clone 4 (if applicable)

variable.name: Abnormal/Total Cells (clone 4)
variable.description: # of abnormal cells in clone 4/total cells evaluated (if applicable)

variable.name: Cytogenetics Clone 5
variable.description: Cytogenetic abnormality found in clone 5 (if applicable)

variable.name: Abnormal/Total Cells (clone 5)
variable.description: # of abnormal cells in clone 5/total cells evaluated (if applicable)

variable.name: months of OS (as of 10/28/08)
variable.description: # of months of Overall Survival

variable.name: months of EFS (as of 10/28/08)
variable.description: # of months of Event Free Survival

variable.name: NUP98 fusion
variable.description: Does participant have a NUP98 fusion (Entrez GeneID: 4928)?

variable.name: ETV6
variable.description: Does participant have a somatic mutation in ETV6 (Entrez GeneID: 2120)?

variable.name: FLT3 - ITD
variable.description: Does participant have a somatic internal tandem duplication (ITD) in FLT3 (Entrez GeneID: 2322)?

variable.name: FLT3 - D835
variable.description: Does participant have a somatic D835 mutation in FLT3 (Entrez GeneID: 2322)?

variable.name: c-Kit
variable.description: Does participant have a somatic mutation in c-KIT (Entrez GeneID: 3815)?

variable.name: NRAS
variable.description: Does participant have a somatic mutation in NRAS (Entrez GeneID: 4893)?

variable.name: KRAS
variable.description: Does participant have a somatic mutation in KRAS (Entrez GeneID: 3845)?

variable.name: NPM1
variable.description: Does participant have a somatic mutation in NPM1 (Entrez GeneID: 4869)?

variable.name: CEBPA
variable.description: Does participant have a somatic mutation in CEBPA (Entrez GeneID: 1050)?

variable.name: PTPN11
variable.description: Does participant have a somatic mutation in PTPN11 (Entrez GeneID: 5781)?

variable.name: p53
variable.description: Does participant have a somatic mutation in p53 (Entrez GeneID: 7157)?

variable.name: RUNX1
variable.description: Does participant have a somatic mutation in RUNX1 (Entrez GeneID: 861)?

variable.name: SPI1
variable.description: Does participant have a somatic mutation in SPI1 (Entrez GeneID: 6688)?
